headline: Why American Tower Stock Rose Today
summary: Shares of American Tower (NYSE: AMT) looked down on Wall Street from a lofty position on Tuesday.  The owner and operator of wireless networking and broadcast infrastructure posted stellar fourth-quarter results in the early morning.  American Tower's fourth-quarter revenue rose 3.7% year over year to $2.55 million.

headline: American Tower Stock Gains on Q4 AFFO Beat, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: AMT's Q4 results reflect a year-over-year rise in revenues, led by property and service operations segment revenues. Strong organic tenant billing growth aids results.

headline: American Tower: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: BOSTON (AP) — American Tower Corp. (AMT) on Tuesday reported a key measure of profitability in its fourth quarter.  The results did not meet Wall Street expectations.  The Boston-based real estate investment trust said it had funds from operations of $1.09 billion, or $2.32 per share, in the period.
